name: shortcut
description: MCP server for Shortcut - Connect to Shortcut's API to manage stories, epics, iterations, teams, and more from your AI assistant.

SHORTCUT_API_TOKEN.description: Your Shortcut API token for authentication

SHORTCUT_TOOLS.description: Comma-separated list of tools to enable (optional, defaults to all tools)

SHORTCUT_READONLY.description: Set to 'true' to disable all write operations

tools.name: stories-get-by-id
tools.description: Get a single Shortcut story by ID

tools.name: stories-search
tools.description: Find Shortcut stories with filtering and search options

tools.name: stories-get-branch-name
tools.description: Get the recommended branch name for a specific story

tools.name: stories-create
tools.description: Create a new Shortcut story

tools.name: stories-update
tools.description: Update an existing Shortcut story

tools.name: stories-upload-file
tools.description: Upload a file and link it to a story

tools.name: stories-assign-current-user
tools.description: Assign the current user as the owner of a story

tools.name: stories-unassign-current-user
tools.description: Unassign the current user as the owner of a story

tools.name: stories-create-comment
tools.description: Create a comment on a story

tools.name: stories-add-task
tools.description: Add a task to a story

tools.name: stories-update-task
tools.description: Update a task in a story

tools.name: stories-add-relation
tools.description: Add a story relationship (relates to, blocks, duplicates, etc.)

tools.name: stories-add-external-link
tools.description: Add an external link to a Shortcut story

tools.name: stories-remove-external-link
tools.description: Remove an external link from a Shortcut story

tools.name: stories-set-external-links
tools.description: Replace all external links on a story with a new set of links

tools.name: stories-get-by-external-link
tools.description: Find all stories that contain a specific external link

tools.name: epics-get-by-id
tools.description: Get a Shortcut epic by ID

tools.name: epics-search
tools.description: Find Shortcut epics with filtering and search options

tools.name: epics-create
tools.description: Create a new Shortcut epic

tools.name: iterations-get-stories
tools.description: Get stories in a specific iteration by iteration ID

tools.name: iterations-get-by-id
tools.description: Get a Shortcut iteration by ID

tools.name: iterations-search
tools.description: Find Shortcut iterations with filtering and search options

tools.name: iterations-create
tools.description: Create a new Shortcut iteration with start/end dates

tools.name: iterations-get-active
tools.description: Get active iterations for the current user based on team memberships

tools.name: iterations-get-upcoming
tools.description: Get upcoming iterations for the current user based on team memberships

tools.name: objectives-get-by-id
tools.description: Get a Shortcut objective by ID

tools.name: objectives-search
tools.description: Find Shortcut objectives with filtering and search options

tools.name: teams-get-by-id
tools.description: Get a Shortcut team by ID

tools.name: teams-list
tools.description: List all Shortcut teams

tools.name: workflows-get-default
tools.description: Get the default workflow for a specific team or the workspace default

tools.name: workflows-get-by-id
tools.description: Get a Shortcut workflow by ID

tools.name: workflows-list
tools.description: List all Shortcut workflows

tools.name: users-get-current
tools.description: Get the current user information

tools.name: users-get-current-teams
tools.description: Get a list of teams where the current user is a member

tools.name: users-list
tools.description: Get all workspace users

tools.name: documents-create
tools.description: Create a new document in Shortcut with HTML content
